description:
After conquering Team France, Team Japan is feeling confident, but another threat looms overhead: Team America. They’ve faced Spencer Henry Hoko before, but just who are Shadow and Monica?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Speed of Sound Menace!! Go-pan #97!
คุกคามด้วยความเร็วเสียง!! โกปังหมายเลข97!
音速の脅威!! ごぱん97号!
